alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 3:00PM MST until December 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches...with the highest amounts on southern facing slopes. * WHERE...Northern and Western Fremont County and Teller County and the Rampart Range. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
